title: Reheat Offender
description:
This week, Reheat Offender. Brandy files suit against her husband Shaun. Brandy believes leftovers should be consumed in a particular order. Shaun doesn’t always want to eat the leftovers according to Brandy’s schedule.

Who’s right? Who’s wrong? Only one can decide!

Thank you to Jon Porobil for naming this week’s case! To suggest a title for a future episode, follow Judge John Hodgman on Facebook. We regularly put out a call for submissions.

—

SUBSCRIBE TO THIS PODCAST in APPLE PODCASTS or the RSS FEED
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
